item.title: Mentioned by TheChronicleHerald.ca
item.description:
CBRM mayor to seek federal, provincial aid to fix Gabarus seawall
The municipality would be willing to take on contracting and implementing the repairs, he said. Clarke said the request comes after he met with Ashfield, Liberal MP Rodger Cuzner and Alfie MacLeod, a Progressive Conservative member of the legislature.
